sentences.english: The recent studies have shown that the therapeutic time window (TTW) for thrombolytic therapy should be individualized.
sentences.chinese: 近年來的研究表明，溶栓治療的時間窗應個體化。

sentences.english: Results—Early 1-hour thrombolysis restored perfusion and reduced infarction.
sentences.chinese: 結果早期1小時溶栓恢復灌注降低梗塞體積。

sentences.english: Methods There were 15 cases of cerebral embolism performed thrombolytic therapy by intervention.
sentences.chinese: 方法對15例腦栓塞患者進行介入性動脈內溶栓治療。

sentences.english: Thrombolytic therapy is an effective tool for treatment of embolism.
sentences.chinese: 溶栓治療是治療血栓性疾病的安全而有效的手段。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the value of percutaneous catheter-directed thrombolysis in treatment of arterial thrombi in limbs.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討經導管動脈內溶栓治療肢體動脈血栓的價值。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the efficacy of intra-arterial thrombolysis in patients with acute internal middle cerebral artery occlusions.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析急性大腦中動脈腦梗死動脈溶栓的療效。

sentences.english: Conclusion Pre-hospital thrombolysis treatment in AMI increases the clinical effect and it is safe.
sentences.chinese: 結論急性心肌梗死院前溶栓臨牀療效提高，而且安全。

sentences.english: Fibrinolytic therapy with streptokinase is less efficacious than previously believed.
sentences.chinese: 用鏈激酶溶栓治療比先前想象的效果更差。

sentences.english: Thrombolytic therapy and anti-coagulation could effective improve the prognosis of PE patients.
sentences.chinese: 溶栓治療和抗凝治療可有效改善患者預後。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To study the thrombolytic and hematolytic effect of crude nattokinase in vitro.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究納豆纖溶酶體外溶栓和溶血作用。

sentences.english: There remains a sex differential in the use of angiography and, therefore, PCI after fibrinolysis.
sentences.chinese: 在溶栓後行血管造影術和PCI，仍存在性別差異。

sentences.english: Methods 20 cases AMI were analysised with pre-hospital thrombolysis treatment.
sentences.chinese: 方法分析20例急性心肌梗死院前溶栓的結果。

sentences.english: Thrombolytic therapy as early as possible is the key to treat thrombophlebitis.
sentences.chinese: 血栓性靜脈炎治療的關鍵是儘早溶栓。

sentences.english: Prourokinase is a new generation of thrombolytic drug with fibrin - selective speciality.
sentences.chinese: 尿激酶原是新一代特異性溶栓藥。

sentences.english: Early percutaneous coronary intervention had more beneficial effects than thrombolytic therapy.
sentences.chinese: 早期介入治療較溶栓治療對患者的存活意義更大。

sentences.english: Thrombolytic therapy for acute ischemic stroke is a hotspot in current medical study.
sentences.chinese: 急性缺血性卒中的溶栓治療是目前醫學研究的熱點。

definition: atrial fibrillation (abbr. for 心房顫動|心房颤动[xin1 fang2 chan4 dong4])
hyperbaric medicine/hyperbaric oxygen therapy (HBOT)/also 高壓氧療法|高压氧疗法[gao1 ya1 yang3 liao2 fa3]
abbr. for 心肌梗塞[xin1 ji1 geng3 sai1], myocardial infarction/heart attack
